identity.name: Ink & Ember
identity.mission: A worldbuilding and narrative management platform for archivists, DMs, and writers.

rules: Use 'Cormorant Garamond' for all Article Titles in Fantasy/Archivist themes.
Use 'Space Grotesk' for headers in Void theme.
Body text must be at least 16px (text-base) for readability.
Long-form content (Manuscripts) must use 'Merriweather' or similar serif with leading-relaxed.
Use 'Caveat' for user notes/annotations to simulate marginalia.

ink_and_ember.description: The default brand theme. Deep obsidian blacks with burning orange accents.

the_archivist.description: Tactile, paper-like feel. Warm whites and iron-gall ink browns.

cathedral.description: Gothic, grand, with a sense of reverence. Deep stone grays and stained glass jewel tones.

dawn.description: Early morning study light. Calm, focused, warm neutrals with subtle sunrise accents.

void_state.description: High contrast, sci-fi, terminal aesthetic. Pure blacks and neon.

ivory.description: Illuminated manuscript aesthetic. Clean parchment tones with restrained ink and subtle gold.

textures: Add a subtle noise overlay (opacity 0.03) to all backgrounds to prevent digital flatness.
Use 'ink splash' masks for images in the Ink & Ember theme.
Use 'paper grain' background patterns for The Archivist theme.
borders: Ink & Ember: 1px solid #2a2a2a with subtle orange glow on active elements.
Archivist: Double borders (3px) for 'important' documents to mimic leather binding.
shadows: Ink & Ember: Deep, ambient shadows (shadow-2xl) colored #000000.

wiki_container.structure: Sidebar (250px fixed) + Main Content (fluid) + Infobox (300px hidden on mobile)
rules: Main content max-width: 80ch for optimal reading.
Infobox must float right on desktop, stack bottom on mobile.
Breadcrumbs are MANDATORY for deep navigation.

timeline_view.style: Horizontal scroll container with sticky 'Era' headers.
timeline_view.interaction: Pinch-to-zoom or slider to change granularity (Century -> Year -> Day).

ArticleCard.description: Card with image cover, title, type badge, and 'last edited' meta.
ArticleCard.style: Overflow hidden, image zoom on hover.

TimelineNode.description: A point on the timeline. Hover reveals summary popover.
TimelineNode.style: Circle marker with connecting line. Color coded by 'Event Type'.

WikiSidebar.description: Collapsible tree navigation for article categories.
WikiSidebar.style: Sticky position. Accordion style for categories.

ThemeSwitcher.description: Dropdown to select one of the 4 themes.

general: Avoid 'AI Slop': No generic gradients, no 'Inter' for headings.
Dark colors must be solid or subtle noise, NOT gradients.
Use 2-3x more spacing than typical SaaS apps.
accessibility: Ensure contrast ratios meet APCA standards.
Interactive elements must have visible focus states.

instructions_to_main_agent: Implement the 4 themes using CSS variables in `index.css` and a ThemeContext. Build the Wiki layout as the core navigation structure. Prioritize the 'Ink & Ember' theme as default. Use the provided image URLs for backgrounds and textures where appropriate.
